reviewText: This not the movie that the public expected, Because is CENSURED and not UNCENSORED. Why Amazon, don't put that in her review. This movie is so much cooler than most of the stuff on the sci-fi channel and channels like tnt.  The cgi is off the hook!!!  The fact that the girls are smoking doesn't hurt either.  ;)  Obviously people will have different opinions of the movie depending on what they are looking for.  Pirates 2 is one of those movies you can throw on, sit back, and be entertained for 2 hours.  Sometimes those are the best kind of movies.  Oh, and the blu-ray looks totally sick!

Let's face it, the odds are, if you're going to be watching a movie like this with actors like these, you're probably in the mood for some sort of raunchy fun.  Rated R?  Knowing this was originally released as an X Rated adult movie, I was surprised to see it on Amazon -- until I saw the rating.  I had to write a review and a recommendation.  My recommendation, not having seen the R version, is to buy the X-Rated version.  It's the only reason you'd be buying this type of movie anyway.  JMO.

The movies, "Pirates" and "Stagnetti's Revenge" are actually very well done in a very tongue in cheek manner.  As good as you'll see for Adult movies.  Hey it was directed by a woman so it's got to have some amount of clarity.  My wife and I watched the first one on BluRay and were very entertained and laughed quite a bit as the movie rolled on.  We (eventually) made it to the end just to see the outcome.  Pun intended.  ;)

If you're looking for the X rated version, go to a site called DVDEMPIRE (dot com) and order it.  The BluRay, high def, version is a must.

The actors, scenes, quality and clarity of the video are very hot, very funny and thoroughly entertaining.  Enjoy!  We did... again and again.

A few months ago I heard about a porn being shown on my campus--I attend UCLA.  My friends and I had to check it out.  While we were expecting cable repair men and pizza guys, what we got was a full blown, special effects driven, feature blockbuster!  "Pirates II" rocks!  It's funny, sexy, and full of action.  There were over a thousand fellow students enjoying the movie with me, and almost half of them were girls.  Nobody walked out.

Now the movie has an R-version and I'm a bit surprised how well it holds up.  The women are just as hot and the action is just as explosive.  Don't expect to see the Disney version of Pirates.  "Pirates II: Stagnetti's Revenge" has a seemingly huge budget for an adult movie (my guess is $10 million), and the R-version is as good as anything produced for TV.  The Disney version is more like $100 million.  What you do get is a fun, raunchy sense of humor that makes the voyage totally worth while.

This covers Pirates and Pirates II  Stagnettis Revenge which are two films that use brothel grindhouse women and learning challenged men, the first movie being wonderfully crammed full of intoxicating women showing off their ample assets as often as you hope they will; the second movie apparently some SOB got the bright idea to cut back on the softcore and hope to make a serious movie instead, even though we still see brothel grindhouse women (this time fully clothed) and learning challenged men on the screen.  Had the producer left in the T & A for both movies these would have been home run favorites.  I despise teaser R-rated films that make you watch all the way through and leave you as disappointed as finding out you just lost your job, had your car repossessed, and your wife tells you shes having her mother move in with you.  The first DVD is definitely 2 thumbs up; the second DVD forgot the pleasure delivering of the first one.  Had the second ones serious attempt at making a Sci-Fi Fantasy film happened with both films that would be fine.  But the first film was a softcore grindhouse skinfest with voluptuous lovely women getting naked, then the second one cant even be considered a sequel.  Just buy the first one if you like naked women, and just buy the second one if you prefer a Sci-Fi Fantasy film. The second one is PG by comparison to the almost NC-17 first film  Seriously.

Although I have nothing against porn, I've never really been into it either; so when my boyfriend brought this movie home for us to watch, I wasn't interested.  However, he insisted that it was recommended as being "very funny" so I finally caved and agreed to watch with him.  I am so glad that I did cave.

Within ten minutes, I was hooked.  Evan Stone (the lead male) carries the movie out of ridiculous porno dialogue and into true comedy.  His humor is cheeky and risque without being ribald.  Steven St. Croix also does a wonderful job of portraying a parody of a macho male--chauvinistic one minute and crying in fetal position the next.

Of the female actresses, Shay Jordan made me giggle with her over-the-top antics, and Katsuni gave a performance that I could have sworn was by a Hollywood actress.  Jesse Jane (the leading lady) played her part with tongue-in-cheek awareness, which I appreciated.  And if nothing else, the women in this movie are astronomically hot.

After seeing this, I purchased the rated X version, which is even funnier.  This movie helped me open up a new genre of entertainment, and I hope that Digital Playground continues to put out Blockbuster adult movies like this one.
